ai-thig3.7:1.1_0: “There is no escape in the world,
ai-thig3.7:1.2_0: and what’s your pardon your seclusion?
ai-thig3.7:1.3_0: Enjoy the delights of sensual pleasure;
ai-thig3.7:2.1_0: “Sensual pleasures are like swords and stakes
ai-thig3.7:2.4_0: is now no delight for me.
ai-thig3.7:3.2_0: the mass of darkness was shattered.
